languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.
languages.original_text:
Требуется убеждение: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — сторонник
Добавляет владельцу +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} за каждое убийство врага до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:
Requires: Benevolentia — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to resolve for each killed enemy until the end of combat.

Requires Benevolentia — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.

languages.text:
Требуется убеждение: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — сторонник
Добавляет владельцу +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} за каждое убийство врага до конца боя.

需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——拥护者
装备者每击杀一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}就会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：人道主义——拥护者
装备者每击杀一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}就会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 門下生
戦闘終了時まで、敵を1体キルするごとに使い手に{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を1与える。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
ベネボレンティア ― 門下生が必要
戦闘終了時まで、敵を1体キルするごとに使い手に{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}覚悟{/g}+1

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Partidario.
Otorga +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} al portador por cada enemigo eliminado hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Benevolentia: Partidario
Otorga +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} al portador por cada enemigo eliminado hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Anhänger.
Gewährt dem Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden getöteten Feind +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Benevolentia — Anhänger.
Gewährt dem Führer bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden getöteten Feind +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}iconoclaste{/g} — Partisan.
Confère à l'utilisateur +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} par ennemi éliminé jusqu'à la fin du combat.
